h2_title: Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: There are certain times after performing slam attacks that he may keep his claws deep in the ground. If he continues to crouch down while charging up, it means he’ll rip his fists out to send a shower of rocks erupting in your path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
There are certain times after performing slam attacks that he may keep his claws deep in the ground. If he continues to crouch down while charging up, it means he’ll rip his fists out to send a shower of rocks erupting in your path.
